akas: The Race to the Million World-wide (English title)
akas from release info: The Race to the Million World-wide (English title)

1.title: Tel Aviv, Israel

episode of.title: The Race to the Million (TV Series 2009– )

1.plot: The Amazing Race Israel is hosted by Ron Shahar. The series is a reality television competition between teams of two, in a race across the world. The race is divided into a number of legs wherein teams travel and complete various tasks to obtain clues to help them progress to a Pit Stop, where teams are given a chance to rest and recover before starting the next leg. The last team to arrive is normally eliminated from the race (except in non-elimination legs, where the last team to arrive may be penalized in the following leg). The final leg of each race is run by the last ...

2.title: New York, New York

episode of.title: The Race to the Million (TV Series 2009– )

2.plot: The Race to the Million is an Israeli reality game show and is based on the original American series The Amazing Race. It features 14 teams of two people with preexisting relationships, who will vie for the substantial cash prize in a race around the world.

imdb.plot outline: The Race to the Million is a reality game show set in Israel and is based on the American series The Amazing Race. It features eleven teams of two with pre-existing relationships, who will vie for the substantial cash prize in a race around the world.
imdb.title: The Race to the Million
plot: _The Race to the Million_ (qv) is a reality game show set in Israel and is based on the American series The Amazing Race. It features eleven teams of two with pre-existing relationships, who will vie for the substantial cash prize in a race around the world.
